sect2.title: Dépendances d'installation d'E2fsprogs
sect2.para: Dernière vérification effectuée auprès de la version &e2fsprogs-depversion;.
sect2.literallayout: Bash: sh Binutils: ar, as, ld, ranlib, strip Diffutils: cmp Fileutils: chmod, cp, install, ln, mkdir, mv, rm, sync Gcc: cc, cc1, collect2, cpp0 Glibc: ldconfig Grep: egrep, grep Gzip: gzip Make: make Gawk: awk Sed: sed Sh-utils: basename, echo, expr, hostname, uname Texinfo: makeinfo Textutils: cat, tr
